Ralph Tendai Mupita bụ injin nke Zimbabwe nke Zimbabwe, onye na-azụ ahịa dị ka onye isi ochev na onye isi oche na onye isi ala site na 1 September 2020 na 19 August 2020
Tupu ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi ego nke MTN site na Eprel 2017 ruo Ọgọst 2020.
A mụrụ Rapheal na Zimbabwe ihe dị ka afọ 1972
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Cape Town, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Civil Engineering
O sochiri nke a site na nzere Master of Business Administration, nke Mahadum Cape Town nyere ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard, na mmemme nchịkwa gụsịrị
Mgbe ogo mmụta mbụ ya gasịrị, Mupita rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye injinia obodo na Haw & Inglis Civil Engineering, na Cape Town ihe karịrị afọ atọ, site na Disemba 1996 ruo Disemba 1999
Na Jenụwarị 2001, ọ sonyere Old Mutual South Africa, na-eje ozi na ọrụ dị iche iche
dị ka Director nke Strategy na dị ka Director nke Retail for High Net-worth & Affluent

Na February 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ Emerging Markets for Old Mutual Plc., dabere na Johannesburg, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo Jenụwarị   
Site na Eprel 2017, ruo Ọgọst 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka CFO nke MTN Group Limited.
Mupita nọchiri Rob Shuter onye rigoro dị ka onye isi ala na 31 Ọgọst 2020.
